summary: Edits to the card editor appear to preserve existing age/version values on save, and React Query hooks were adjusted to perform non-blocking invalidations (intended to improve perceived save/sell speed). However, the diff evidence is truncated and does not clearly show sell-specific behavior changes, and an unrequested Google OAuth hook is referenced in the updated frontend summaries.

missing_requirements.requirement: Improve perceived performance for "Sell" (mark card as sold) by preventing the UI from waiting on multiple sequential React Query invalidations/refetches before closing the dialog and showing success feedback.
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff excerpt for React Query hooks is truncated before any sell/mark-as-sold mutation logic, and no sell dialog/component file is listed as modified, so there is insufficient direct evidence that the sell flow no longer awaits sequential invalidations before closing.
evidence: MODIFIED FILES list does not include a sell dialog/component (e.g., SellOrTradeDialog)

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of Google OAuth2 authentication via a new/updated `useGoogleAuth` hook (Google Identity Services), implying an additional auth provider beyond Internet Identity.
hallucinated_features.reason: This feature is not requested and conflicts with the non-goal of not introducing new authentication providers; the only evidence is its inclusion in the updated `frontend-file-summaries.txt` content.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (truncated): "frontend/src/hooks/useGoogleAuth.ts": "Custom React hook implementing real Google OAuth2 authentication..."
